name: Worms Forts: Under Siege
notes: If the game doesn't launch change Executable (Rightclick -> Configure -> Game Options) to GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Worms Forts Under Siege/options.exe and turn off Native Res. Then set Executable to GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Worms Forts Under Siege/WF.exe again.

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Worms Forts Under Siege/WF.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SILENT /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/GOG Games/Worms
      Forts Under Siege"
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    R600_TEX_ANISO: 0
    __GL_FSAA_MODE: 0
    __GL_LOG_MAX_ANISO: 0
